intro.title: We are a group of highly qualified developers that perform technical projects on a wide range of scale and difficulty.

why.title: Why Siberian?
why.desc: Siberian, LLC has successfully delivered software products, apps, and solutions to its clients using a proven agile/scrum develop-ment process combined with an advanced group of software engineers.

offer: We can offer range of service starting with individual dev resources and up to a whole team consisting of back end, front end, QA and optionally project manager.
Our experience at working with medium and large businesses is what allows us to be a reliable task force for our clients.
Also we are adept at dealing with business rules, special requirements and regulations, and the responsibilities that come with these parameters due to years of experience in the e-commerce field.
